name: Jumbo Vitamin Enriched Face Base Moisturizer & Primer with Vitamin C + Hyaluronic Acid
about: What it is:A primer with moisturizing benefits for smooth makeup applicationit\s the best of both worlds..Skin Type:Normal, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Dryness, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Oiliness.Formulation:Cream.Ingredient Callouts:Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, and phthalates. This product is also vegan and gluten-free..What Else You Need to Know:This formula combines the moisturizing power of shea butter with vitamins B, C, and E. Grapefruit and geranium fragrances leave a light, uplifting scent on skin. With daily use, skin looks and feels its best.
ingredients: -Vitamins B, C, and E: Help replenish and condition skin with essential nourishment..-Hyaluronic Acid, Squalane, and Shea Butter: Help quickly hydrate, visibly plump, and prep skin for a fresh, healthy-looking glow. .-Grapefruit and Geranium: Leave a light, uplifting scent on skin. ..WaterAquaEau, Cyclopentasiloxane, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Butylene Glycol, Ppg-2 Myristyl Ether Propionate, Cetyl Alcohol, Peg-40 Stearate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Squalane, Glyceryl Stearate, Sorbitan Stearate, Epilobium Angustifolium Extract, Yeast ExtractFaexExtrait De Levure, Beta-Carotene, Sodium Hyaluronate, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Methyl Glucose Sesquistearate, Pelargonium Graveolens (Geranium) Flower Oil, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Carbomer, Peg-20 Methyl Glucose Sesquistearate, C12-15 Alkyl Ethylhexanoate, Tetrasodium Edta, Sodium Hydroxide, Panthenol, Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Limonene, Citronellol, Geraniol, Linalool, Chlorphenesin, Phenoxyethanol...Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up-to-date list of ingredients.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply to just-cleansed skin, avoiding eye area...Fresh, Healthy-Looking Skin in Three Steps: .-Prep: Apply Vitamin Enriched Face Base to hydrate, smooth, and prime skin for makeup application. .-Correct: Apply Corrector (sold separately) to areas of discoloration under the eye using the Concealer Blending Brush (sold separately), getting as close to the lash line and innermost corner as possible. Gently blend with your finger, and layer concealer on top. .-Perfect: Using the Full Coverage Face Brush (sold separately), buff Skin Long-Wear Weightless Foundation SPF 15 (sold separately) onto skin, starting at the center of the face and blending outward.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great base for heavy or light foundation, I even use it without makeup. Love the smell and the sheen and glow it gives my skin.

reviews.review_title: Best Priming Moisturizer money can buy :)
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is absolutely amazing! I tried this back in November of last year, and when I first tried it, my skin absorbed it in so well! I've never used a product this enriching and the results were almost immediate. I've had my jumbo container since FEBRUARY that I still use and love her to this day, and I only use it underneath makeup (so that I don't run out as quickly). A little goes a long way.  For reference, I have very dry skin (like the Sahara desert lol), and I only use water-based products for skin care and make up routine so that there is no improper mixing and pilling of products.  You can get different sizes for cheaper, which is also really nice. I will say the jumbo size is quite an investment, but she is SOOOOO worth it. Highly recommend for people with dry skin. Really works well under water based makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: While the product is nice, the price jumps are insane. Last year, this was $132. Pre-COVID, this was $88!!!!!!!

reviews.review_title: One of the best primers I\ve tried
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So far I\m really enjoying this cream. It hydrates my face and makes me feel more glowy when I do my makeup. Definitely an investment for the price tag though.

reviews.review_title: Adds age like a snapchat filter
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Purchased hoping to drop a step from my routine and I regrettably went all in with jumbo size due to value. It's extremely thick and makes my wrinkles stand out 10x more, like I instantly look 30 years older. Not feeling primer vibes at all. Currently taking a break from suffering through the jar--back to separate moisturizer and primer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_title: Holy Grail face base for oily skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm 100% sold on this product! I have extremely oily, acne-prone skin that is also sensitive and dry (it makes no sense). I have to be very careful of over-exfoliation or my skin gets super red and raw, while still producing tons of oil. My morning skin prep used to be moisturizer + eye cream + sunscreen + Hourglass mineral veil primer + Urban Decay eye primer potion, the latter two being the only products I've ever found that helped me with makeup meltdown in any capacity. This product takes the place of moisturizer and both primers I previously used and I'd argue is an even better makeup base than before. Now, I start with eye cream, layer this all-over including eye area (there is also an eye version of this product but the face version works great so I don't see the point), and finish with a tinted SPF. I love how much it's simplified my routine but even better is how much more effective the new routine is.  For reference, my face is so oily I can solidly fill an entire blue blotting paper in about 1.5 hrs. With my old routine, eye makeup smudged constantly throughout the day and at 31 I'm sure I've prematurely created wrinkles rubbing this off constantly. With the new routine using this product, I'm about as oily but my eye makeup can go all day without smudging. All of my makeup actually lasts much longer with this product than before but I'm sososo impressed about the eye makeup I have to point that out. On top of that, I love the ingredients in this, like vitamin C, the texture, scent, how it goes on, etc. It's been a while since I've found a holy grail, must repurchase forever product but this is one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This + Bobbi browns spf foundation = flawless skin. I can	 even tell you how much compliments I get with this combo. This is my 6th jar. 10/10!!

reviews.review_text: I can	 believe i was sleeping on this by far the best primer i have ever tried i have poly acne prone skin and it did not make my acne worse and it did not make me more oily. It makes your face so smooth

reviews.review_title: Been using for years, day or night.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this for several years. Mostly as a moisturizer for my aging skin. Then I discovered it's a great primer too! I have no facial wrinkled at 67. As a serum underneath, I use the Vit C one from Ole Henrickson. great combo. not greasy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It\s my first time to use this one. I really loved it because it could be used as a primer as well as a day time cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm giving this five stars for now... I have very oily acne prone skin and buying this was a real leap of faith because the person who I originally heard about it from has ultra dry skin. But living in Alberta (especially now that it's winter) I wanted something a bit more nourishing since it's so dry here and I am shocked at how well it's been working for me. I usually know pretty quick if my skin is going to freak out at something and so far (it's been a week!) so good. I've been using this with the dr. jart cicapair on top and some laura mercier setting powder and it's the best my skin has looked in AGES. I use it as a daytime moisturizer, not a nighttime one though. Note: it does smell very citrussy so if you don't like that smell or if you're scent sensitive, you might want to avoid. For comparison, my summer routine is the origins matte moisturizer (in the pink container) with the biossance gel one over top.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I never use primers and honestly I was skeptical. I have dry skin and textured skin and bought the mini version to try it out and omg it is so moisturizing and my makeup looks flawless. I ended up placing an order for the jumbo size! It\s expensive but so worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of my beauty essentials.  It smells amazing, citrusy a bit but not strong and it feels so soothing on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My makeup looks amazing when I use this as a base, I also use it as just a moisturizer&it works nicely, attached is photos &I swatched so you can see the texture , I got the huge one, a little goes a long way

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Instant results. Works as intended. However it made me break out (acne prone and sensitive skin) so I gave it to my mom. She has mature skin that isn't sensitive so this product works amazing for her.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm so excited to have found the jumbo sized bottle! They used to carry it at Nordstrom but quickly sold out. This is my favorite pre-makeup moisturizer. Smells citrus fresh, feels incredibly hydrating and absorbs into my skin very well. A little goes a long way. Best used for people without oily skin.

reviews.review_title: For my skin, nothing has ever been better.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Just looked and my last order of the Jumbo was 5/10/21, so $0.25 a day for perfection feels pretty reasonable! I started with the travel size, so refill that and keep the big jar in the back of the fridge with parchment on it. It's always fresh! This is one of my never replace, will weep when it's discontinued, favorite ever parts of my routine. I have very dry (USED TO) skin and use a good whack of this every morning on face and neck and then rub the remainder into my hands. It has a real aroma, but as someone with very sensitive skin to perfumes it doesn't bother my skin and I love the way it smells. Clean, citrus and it dissipates almost immediately. I feel terrible for the folks this doesn't work for because I ran out TODAY and was just so mad at me for the few days I'm going to have to live without it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I  was doubtful at first but I love how my skin feels and looks!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Another review stated that this was worth every penny, and I completely agree. my skin is very special - dry if I dont use moisturizer, oily if I do. This product is perfect! My skin gets moisturized, not the slightest bit oily, and my makeup looks flawless all day long. The luxurious consistency and fragrance are an added bonus. I will never go without this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin and always use this during the summer/warmer weather for yearssss!

reviews.review_text: Beautiful texture and smell. I am careful to apply it just before foundation. I have combo skin and it\s not too rich for me. Will always have this. The perfect morning/priming moisturizer. For the last two years I\ve purchased the holiday super size and it\s lasted almost the whole year since I only use it once a day. A high end product that\s truly worth every penny.

reviews.review_text: This magic bottled up, it makes my skin look and feel like glass. Also before this my makeup would go away in patches since i am pro acne skin all they way, but i had finished my accutane  treatment so my skin was extremely dry and i decided to give a chance to this product and wow with how much i love it.

reviews.review_title: Moisturizes well, but feels very lightweight
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this product. I'm someone who takes very good care of their skin, and this is a nice and rich moisturizer to wear under my sunscreen. Even though it's rich and moisturizes well, it feels very light weight on your skin. It also smells good. Would definitely recommend! I purchased the mini size first to try it, and just purchased the 3.38 oz because I like it so much.
